website_summaries.verdict: A durable and reliable option – perfect for someone who values quality and is willing to skimp on aesthetics.
pros: We loved the tube-style cord that came with the Xiberua headset
The cord was thick and strong and didn't get tangled together like some other models
While the extra thick ear padding does make the headset larger than most, the comfort it provides is worthwhile
We were impressed with the sound quality and bass, which was on par with other headsets in the $400 range
The sound from the microphone came across clear and loud
We loved that this microphone was bendable so you can easily adjust it to an optimal spot
cons: When it comes to appearance we found the red, brown and black colors clashed
The set makes your head appear quite large

customer_reviews.title: Good, but no way they do surround decoding.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, fantastic mic quality. I only gave it 4 stars just because it is not really surround sound, the game or the operating system does the virtual surround, not these headphones. Windows in fact identifies them as stereo headphones. If someone can prove otherwise, I'll change the rating. Still for $20 they're a steal, and far better than my much more expensive Logitech G930's that have driver issues, and a tendency to break.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stromberg

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat what you get for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap, comfortable and fit very well. I have a decent sized roundish head and they are very comfortable after almost two hours of wear. Sound quality is good. What I love: weight, fit, the BEEFY CORD, sound quality, and the comfortable ear pads What could be better: the volume control is cheap (but hey its <$20!) Plugged them in, they worked. Played Fallout 4 while listening to Gunship on Amazon. No issues. Five stars because of overall price-to-performance ratio. I've bought $80 headphones that were worse. Never bought a $20 set nearly this good.
customer_reviews.author: Allan B.

customer_reviews.title: I AM AMAZED
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for a full year before writing this review. I am AMAZED at the quality of this headset for the price. I previously owned 3 different ~$200 "gaming" headsets that had worse earcups, worse mic quality, and shorter cheaper cables. This headset is an INSANE deal, and it's basically the only headset i've found that genuinely has no ear pain after 8+ hours of use. I have no idea what Razer, Logitech, Turtlebeach are doing, this is MILES ABOVE them and it's dirt cheap. I am thoroughly confused by this juxtaposition.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Great, affordable, quality USB Headset for PS3, PS4, PC and XBox!
customer_reviews.text: After spending a fortune on a Turtle Beach headset for my son that promptly stopped working, I replaced his and my headset with the XIBERIA E1 USB Gaming Headset. And I am glad I did. Don't let the price-point fool you, this is a quality USB headset that we both use regularly for PS3, PS4 and PC online gaming. Quiet and comfortable, the headset comes with the basic functionality you expect in more expensive headsets. It does not have a separate mute button, but for our gaming needs, it works great. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. Michael Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset... like REALLY great.
customer_reviews.text: This is legit the most awesome headset that ever did awesome.... I literally own 3 of these... We loved the first one I tried for my gaming rig so much that I ordered one for my daughter and one for my office... Sound quality is actually exceptional. They're SUPER comfortable with all that cushion on your ear and the mic works great. There are no controls on the headset itself. Everything is controlled through the auto-installing software. The quality on this headset is exceptional especially for the price. I've owned $100 headsets that weren't this nice.
customer_reviews.author: Led Jedi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Budget USB Headset!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good for the money, the cable is thick and has held up well to child abuse. I bought these for my nephew for Christmas, he's taken them with him everywhere and loves them. Extremely comfortable, the sound is also very good, crisp yet bassy, the headband and self-adjust works great, even with heavy plastic-use these feel very durable, the mic also records crisp and clear. Great for a communication. Highly recommended budget USB gaming headset, has a lot of features and qualities I'd expect from a headset that cost far far more than these!
customer_reviews.author: Sean L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound!
customer_reviews.text: These are actually EXCELLENT headphones. I ordered these for myself as I needed to replace a pair I broke and wanted USB since my laptop only has 1 3.5mm port. My concern was if they would fit my head since I have a fairly big noggin. They do, albeit a bit snug, so I gave them to my son. I did use them some to test and the sound is fantastic on them and the fit is quite comfortable. Ear pads are very soft and no one had a problem hearing me via the mic. Hard to be believe these are only $20.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this one
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about a week and then the left speaker stopped working completely. The volume on the headpiece is a pain and doesn't go as loud as I would like. I am returning it and will spend more for a better set.
customer_reviews.author: BBQ_POPE

customer_reviews.title: Great for computers but won’t work on consoles, tablets, etc.
customer_reviews.text: The good: This headset is probably the most comfortable I have ever worn. The earpiece is extremely soft and can be worn for long periods of time. As opposed to normal headsets that require you to adjust each side, the head band has wires that automatically adjust to the right size when put on which is quick and convenient. The sound is good and they look and function great. The bad: These only have a usb connection and will only work on a pc/Mac there is no audio cord so they will not work on consoles, tablets, etc. Also, there is no in line volume control or mute feature.
customer_reviews.author: bmccune

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HEADSET ALL AROUND!
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted to contribute the review below of this headset that I got for him. I found them to be comfortable to wear with eyeglasses on with fairly responsive bass and balanced highs. ---- GREAT HEADSET! I just got into Fortnite and this headset is great for Fortnite, and for all uses. It is a bit big, the cushions are kinda bulky and so is the usb cord, but I really like this headset nonetheless. The bass as well is amazing and I 100% recommend any questioned buyers, to purchase the XIBERIA E1 USB!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lou

customer_reviews.title: ... might be a bit bulky but are actually really comfortable even when worn for long periods of time
customer_reviews.text: I thought these might be a bit bulky but are actually really comfortable even when worn for long periods of time. The headset I replaced had a nylon wrapped usb cable which frayed and was constantly becoming tangled, the cable on these is far superior and does not suffer from this but the most important thing is the great sound quality and easily adjustable mic position. The large ear cups fit comfortably over the ears and the strap evenly distributes the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Felspar

customer_reviews.title: Solid headset
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised by the quality for the price. Using these daily for a conference call headset instead of for gaming. Sound is perfect, everyone on the other end says the microphone sounds great too. LEDs glow bright red, just an FYI, I didn't notice it mentioned before I purchased, but not bothersome. Working perfectly on a Mac Pro (10.13 High Sierra), as well as a Windows 10 laptop. No software to install, quick and easy. Cord is extra long (5-6ft?) so plenty of slack at my desk. Solid headset.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: good sound, could be louder, not noise canceling
customer_reviews.text: good sound, could be louder, i can listen at 100% with zero discomfort, i'd rather have more then i need as far as volume goes. lack of mute for mic is less then optimal. with they came with plainer design scheme, but i knew they were on the ugly side when i bought them lol. They aren't noise canceling like the listing title says, figured that was to good to be true, i can clearly hear background noise while wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Imp

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good sound quality, durable cord.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and strong headset good as a gift for those who don't handle their technology very professionally My dad loves this headset says the sound quality is twice as good as his previous headphones (some cheap bose headphones for like 10 bucks) it glows red from the grid area and is a usb cord fits pretty comfortably (unless you have a huge head)
customer_reviews.author: Aechkay

customer_reviews.title: Well-constructed, good sound, and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good, the microphone works well, and they're pretty comfortable as well. They're stylish, block out a lot of outside noise so you don't have to play them too loudly, and are easily adjustable. They start to feel a little tight after a couple hours of wear, but that's likely necessary to create the quiet environment to let the speakers shine.
customer_reviews.author: Adam & Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought!
customer_reviews.text: These sound excellent, especially for the money you spend on them. They are worth double what you pay for, the build quality is a lot higher than I expected. Even the cord looks of high quality and looks like these headphones are going to last for awhile. The ear cushions are very comfortable and I didn't have any discomfort for a nice 4 hour session of gaming. Sound quality is very good, the low end is nice and rumbly and the highs aren't too sharp where it'll make your ears bleed. I like these headphones a lot, wish I purchased them sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha NinjaTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Headset! Please consider purchasing!
customer_reviews.text: I had a logitech g230 headset, you'd think because it's a big brand name they'd be better then most brands. W R O N G! lol. I had two of those logitech headsets and they are EXTREMELY fragil and they break easily. But these babies? These headsets sound great and are SUPER DUPER durable! A great purchase for the price!
customer_reviews.author: bernabecoland

customer_reviews.title: Fully featured yet inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my teenage son to use for gaming on his laptop. They are robust yet lightweight and comfortable. My son really likes the lighting on the headphones, makes it look pretty cool. The volume dial is simple and easy to use. It worked immediately when he plugged the USB into his laptop. For the price this is a great pair of cans.
customer_reviews.author: Blind Dad

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price.  But will they last?
customer_reviews.text: For the price they feel good, comfortable. Mic is completely adjustable, including the sound intake piece at the end. Mice works fine. Sound for gaming is good. For music average though bass isn't too bad for the price. They start to distort listening to music if volume is too high. I bought these for gaming though and they are absolutely fine. USB plugged into my PS4 Pro and worked without issue.
customer_reviews.author: AfflictedEdge

customer_reviews.title: Great budget set
customer_reviews.text: These are a heck of a deal. For about twenty bucks, you can slip these on and you won't be bothered by extraneous noises emanating from parents, siblings, room mates, children, fire alarms, etc. In fact, a car could crash into your home, and outside of the subtle vibrations from a structure rocked to it's core, you would likely never hear the screams. Sound quality is good, and the lack of dedicated volume control made me suck my teeth a little, but all in all at this price point it can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: mummdaddy

customer_reviews.title: XIBERIA E1 USB Gaming Headset with Microphone,Over Ear Wired Stereo Computer Headphones
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful set of gaming headphones. Crisp and clear communication with squadmates, air battle and tank fire to the sound of whispers and the wind on Arma 3. Yeah, I am now a fan of XIBERIA products.
customer_reviews.author: David Storm

customer_reviews.title: After having them locked up somewhere in an old bag in my closet, they finally started working.
customer_reviews.text: Alright. So from my previous review, I gave them a 1 star because they stopped working So, After having them stored since I got them, I got tired of my logicrap headset that's far too overpriced, and I got these ones, and plugged them in. They have good bass, they have clear audio, they're super comfortable and they're very cheap. They're very fragile from my past experiences of everso-dramatically dropping them on my padded bed. After I got them working, they're certainly more quiet than my old logibad headphones, but certainly much better. With logitech you're really just paying for the brand. they're pretty good. (only 4 stars because of the mattress incident)
customer_reviews.author: Lazaro G.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, heavy duty cable, and VERY COMFY!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW this headset is AMAZING. The quality of product is great, the cable is thick and heavy duty, big enough to fit my big head and my big ears easily, very comfy. At first I thought the sound was going to be too low but once i actually started playing (Fortnite for PS4) they were just perfect and the 7.1 surround sound is on point.You really do get immersed in the game with these. On my first try I got 8 kills which is a new personal record lol. I was able to play for 4 hours straight with no discomfort and no sweating. I would definitely recommend for $18.99 it a no brainer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding headphones for $20 price range
customer_reviews.text: I have used a lot of headsets for gaming over the last decade of a lot of different qualities. I have used cheap-o's and nice expensive high quality ones and I have to say these are some of the best ones you will buy for $20 price range. The mic is outstanding, The sound quality is very nice for gaming. You can hear a lot more around you than with average headphones, they are crazy comfortable and the ear cups will completely cover your ear for passive noise cancelling.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: These are some great quality headphones, and they really shocked us. We were expecting just ordinary temporary plastic headphones for under 20 bucks but were surprised how great these headphones really are. Sound is great. Mic is awesome and cord is thick and rugged. It also has a metal headband which makes these really durable. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like the sound quality produced when gaming with these
customer_reviews.text: I really like the sound quality produced when gaming with these. My only issue was the microphone sounds incredibly muffled no matter what I’ve tried. I don’t know if it’s just mine or not because I’ve read reviews saying audio was crystal clear, I hope so because I really want to love these. Other than that the cord is nice length, I liked the volume control on the side but it takes some getting used to there being no mute button.
customer_reviews.author: Miss_K

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and functional
customer_reviews.text: For $20 these are damn good headphones. I like that it is usb and that the volume control is built in the headset. I have not tried the mic yet. The cord is very thick and they look good too. I use these to play League of Legends and so far no issues. I would recommend these to anyone on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Buff Man Dan

customer_reviews.title: ... headset i would just save up and buy a better for about 10$ more it would have been a ...
customer_reviews.text: this headsets wire will tangle in a day making extremely hard to do anything then after about a week the headphones will complelty stop working if you plan on getting this headset i would just save up and buy a better for about 10$ more it would have been a nice headset if the wire didn't tangle so easy
customer_reviews.author: elaine orr

customer_reviews.title: The cost is amazing for such a quality item.
customer_reviews.text: Great headset, sound is very clear w/ deep lows. The mic sounds rich and clear, from what my tanking buddies have told me. No disc install needed, just plug in and the system will recognize it. Sounds great with music, gaming and chat. I would totally recommend this product. Oh comfort, I have been wearing them for 12 hours a day for the past few days (maybe more, so says my girl) totally comfortable with no signs of ear rubbing or neck strain. The top padding self adjusts to your size. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Heather Drost

customer_reviews.title: Crappy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely sucks. Bought 1 pair and they worked for a couple days, send in a request for a new pair and that pair only worked for 2 weeks. Waste of money and super upset about it because my child needs them for his online schooling.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Good heaphones, but broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: I liked these headphones at first, they were comfortable and sounded good, but just a month and a half into owning them the sound went out in the right ear completely. That makes them pretty useless for gaming, because now I don't have stereo audio to hear where the enemies are around me, and of course, they stopped working just weeks after I could return them. I wasn't hard on them either, with pretty light use they just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great sound and a great price
customer_reviews.text: great sound and a great price. they're heavy and put some pressure on my lower jaw when worn for extended periods of time. i may just have a tinier head than they're intended for though... most similar products aren't designed for women, though I'm not sure we're still a minority in the gaming scene. anyway, a manual adjustment for the headband would have been nice. i consider it a negligible issue for a $20 pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but not cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic bargain! I was a bit thrown off by the rather dull package, but the headset itself is quite impressive. The volume is a hair quiet for my tastes, but very clear. Works with Linux, which is a huge plus for me. A bit hefty, but they seem durable. Also, the USB cable is thick and tough, an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Tortuga

customer_reviews.title: The sound is great, although the mic is a bit muffled sounding ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great, although the mic is a bit muffled sounding to others, but clear otherwise. The headset is almost perfectly comfortable, but the right cup is either shallower than the left, or it isn't as strong, so my right ear brushes against the speaker fabric, which can get quite uncomfortable/annoying over time. For the price it's alright, and the bass is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Best price/performance, and not just because the price is unbeatably low...
customer_reviews.text: Best price/performance headset we've found yet. For the price of just ONE of the high-end headsets we've since had to replace, I could buy FIVE of these. And going forward, that's the plan. It's comfortable, easy to use, and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Howard V. Tayler

customer_reviews.title: Great stereo headset for the money
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable ear covering headset fits my rather large head, sturdy USB cable and sound cancelling is amazing. A mike volume control would have been nice.. But this is a very nice headset for just under $20.00
customer_reviews.author: Steve and Suzanne M. Collands

customer_reviews.title: Wow what good deal!
customer_reviews.text: I use the headset for two key activities in my day: listening to music and Skype calls. The headset gives me clear audio and the microphone picks my voice well. Another great thing is this headset is very comfortable even when wearing for extended periods. This headset is truly a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I am bery pleased with this headset for the price. Only negative is no volume control on the mic cable and the cable itself is rather think and heavy. The headset is very comfortable, mic is good, and sounds great
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Honestly my favorite headset I've used.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is very good, although a little light on bass. It's is incredibly well built and feels like it will last forever. It looks a little funky, and the red LEDs on the sides are kind of absurdly bright. If you sleep in the same room you use these in, you'll find yourself unplugging to avoid the red light. Love them otherwise, though.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Siegfried

customer_reviews.title: Good for conferencing and gaming, not much for music
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Pretty good overall construction, very comfortable, very good for games or conferencing Contras: One side had the driver wired on opposite polarity to the other, so it created phase issues on the stereo imaging. Also the frequency range is pretty limited, specially highs, so it tends to sound "dull".
customer_reviews.author: Tomas

customer_reviews.title: Get the job done for playing sound they get hot covering ears. Update: They lasted exactly 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: These get the job done for playing sound but they get very hot covering your ears. Update: They lasted exactly 2 years before failing to play sound anymore and I took great care of them. They were used at night for one hour, otherwise sat on the desk.
customer_reviews.author: scl

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: I used this headset for a while my friends never complained about Mic quality, and when I listened to it myself it sounded like a professional microphone. The sound quality is pretty good for a headset for this cost. Noise cancellation was ok not perfect though. Honestly this is a great headset for the price, I’m surprised it’s not worth more.
customer_reviews.author: James Pitchford

customer_reviews.title: Best computer headphones
customer_reviews.text: Best computer headphones. Incredible price considering. Very comfortable, over-sized so it doesn't crush my ears. Sound quality is good too. I like being able to move the mic out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Roald

customer_reviews.title: Useless.
customer_reviews.text: No volume control so you're stuck in 1st gear. It was advertised to have a volume control. They lied.
customer_reviews.author: Ward

customer_reviews.title: great quality fits over my big ears
customer_reviews.text: im not a audiophile but it sounds great to me the cable is nice and thick and survived getting caught under my chair which has ripped other cords but this one took it like a champ and doesnt even show any damage. the build quality honeslty feels really good especially considering the price i have big ears and they go over my ears completely and dont bother me
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes it would work fine, but if I turned my head and moved ...
customer_reviews.text: There is a weak wire connection to the headset. After only 1 week of use audio would start dropping out of different speakers. Sometimes it would work fine, but if I turned my head and moved the wire I would lose audio.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre D. Le Troadec

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The sound and mic quality is really good. The build quality is great. It is rather heavy from the over ear headset to the super strong cord itself.
customer_reviews.author: DLTyree

customer_reviews.title: ... was a bit skeptical to order these but I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical to order these but I'm glad I did. I can't believe how good these sound and actually block out a lot of background noise. They are also very comfortable as well. The only thing I wish they had was a mute switch for the mic so that I can turn it off when I don't want it on.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Iverson

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this headset over a year and its still good, i dont use the mic since i have a Yeti but the sound quality is great. Some issues ive had sometimes is when i take my headset off i will lower the volume on accident and have to readjust it but its still great headset
customer_reviews.author: ozzy torres

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headphones. Noise cancelling is great and sound is awesome. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan P

customer_reviews.title: This headset isn't amazing but it's worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This headset isn't amazing but it's worth the money. Pro: -Covers my huge ears completely (one of the most important things for me) -very comfortable -Microphone actually works well Cons: -Sound is slightly distorted, favoring lower sounds to higher sounds. Not great for listening to vocals, but great for listening to beats, and gaming -Microphone is omnidirectional, which leads to it picking up a lot of background noise. I would recommend this to a friend looking for a cheap headset, though I personally am unsure if I would buy it again, I'll likely spend a bit more on a more expensive set.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable on head
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is pretty decent for price. Very comfortable as well, more so than my $90 old headset. My PC only has one set of stereo inputs so I ordered a USB headset to avoid having to plug and unplug my old headset.
customer_reviews.author: Krristopher P

customer_reviews.title: The sound from these is amazing. The only thing I don't like is they ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound from these is amazing. The only thing I don't like is they aren't adjustable. But the sound is so incredible I bought a second pair for my Dad who is an audiophile. These handle bass really well, in fact my face just about shakes. I also find that I no longer wish I could turn the volume louder as I haven't made it beyond the halfway point before it gets too loud!
customer_reviews.author: Carol K.

customer_reviews.title: Almost there
customer_reviews.text: These are more than adequate. The only problem I have is that the cord is very thickly coated in a plastic shield that, while very durable, makes it difficult to coil up and store. Good sound, comfortable, and otherwise excellent
customer_reviews.author: James Martin

customer_reviews.title: High quality comfort and sound at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are very comfortable and the audio quality is great. Even though they are very big, they can be worn comfortably for many hours. I've used them for teleconferences and the other participants heard me without any problem, so the microphone is very good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Aygee Khay

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice on my head!
customer_reviews.text: Barely hear anything in this headset! All the volume controls are at 100% but everything is at a whisper. :( super disappointed. I cant even use it for gaming since I cant hear my teammates! Edit: found the volume control on the left side on the back....
customer_reviews.author: Sam Black

customer_reviews.title: GOOD SOUND BUT NOT LOUD ENOUGH
customer_reviews.text: Very clear sound but not loud enough for me. Also kind of bulky with heavy cord, I do not like the LED on my headset I do not play games...
customer_reviews.author: AlainS

customer_reviews.title: Good headset, especially at its price point
customer_reviews.text: Overall a very good product for the price. Sound and mic quality are quite good, and they're comfortable enough for fairly long gaming/voice chat sessions. I have noticed that programs (i.e. discord, audacity) will often not automatically detect the headset microphone's audio input when it is first plugged in even if it's set as the default device, forcing you to rescan for connected devices, but overall that's a pretty minor complaint. If you're looking for a budget headset, this is definitely a great option to consider.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Audio was just bad/glitchy...
customer_reviews.text: random weird audio feedback that was really painful to my ears and made me afraid to even wear them, plus the sound was really tinny. The mic worked alright and the cushioning was good but the headset was fairly heavy. The audio really killed it for me though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound is not great. Bass is almost nonexistent
customer_reviews.text: Sound is not great. Bass is almost nonexistent. Get distortion at higher volume. They're also pretty ugly, lol. One pro is that they are pretty comfy. You're getting what you pay for with these.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Have a Standard Jack
customer_reviews.text: This product connects via usb and I have yet to find an adapter that works for it. The sound quality is good, but make sure whatever you're buying it to use for, supports USB.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Audio output went out after one year
customer_reviews.text: My son used this for games and to use the computer for voice chat with family. After about a year of occasional use, the headphones no longer output audio. Mic input and power lights are still functioning via testing on multiple computers, but audio output has totally failed.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Jecha

customer_reviews.title: Great sound at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: These headphone are extremely comfortable, sound is great, and the price is unbeatable. My only complaint is the cable is a little thick, and is not as flexible as one would expect on a headset.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Anderman

customer_reviews.title: Best headset for the price...
customer_reviews.text: I love this headset. Durable and has great sound. I've even been complimented on how clear the mic sounds in games. When you're wearing these you cannot hear anything outside.
customer_reviews.author: Kendrick Keeton

customer_reviews.title: best headphone ever
customer_reviews.text: best headphone ever. it completely covers the ears without cause ears sweating. and the sound is 100% clear. i used it to play battleground, i can hear someone walking in the next building!!!
customer_reviews.author: Agent329

customer_reviews.title: Had it for a day
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a day and all the sudden I couldn't hear anyone talking and my sound got real quite. And this while I was in game and talking to someone!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Solid headset for a solid price.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for roughly 6 months now, has had multiple falls and treated rough but still working great. Connection is made of really sturdy plastic rubber material.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Theyre good
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly great. I was not expecting much for the price, but they sound great, the mic sounds great, they are comfy, and they do what I need them to do.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Mccormick

customer_reviews.title: To Put it As Nice as Possible - These Headphones SUCK!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs for my children and the first was broken in under 10 minutes, the second pair were broken the next day. Very cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kluver

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphone for people with a lot of piercings or ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headphone for people with a lot of piercings or big ears. Mic picks of a lot of background noise very clearly. Hope you live alone. Be careful about the volume knob behind the left earcup, your headset isn't broken.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Peets

customer_reviews.title: that they covered my ears and cancelled noise
customer_reviews.text: I haven't found anything to dislike about these headphones. I would suggest that you in some way make the pictures reflect that these cover the ears. I almost didn't by them because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy L. Boyles

customer_reviews.title: Little big, but works
customer_reviews.text: The head band is a bit big for my head and doesn't' adjust tight enough.
customer_reviews.author: Phil P

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are very light, comfortable, and work great! May not be the most attractive but when they work like this who cares.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This my first ever review so I don’t I’m not sure what to say but I’ll say what I can. I am satisfied with the product as it has reached my expectations. The audio is very nice it even has the 7.1 surround sound and the is great too. I had no problems with the headphones or microphone being to quiet or loud. I was suprised on how big the headphones were but they caused no issue and were really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon G

customer_reviews.title: Pretty basic, but it's functional
customer_reviews.text: Pretty basic, but it's functional. I had sound problems like the other users reported but found a volume control wheel on the back. I slipped a windscreen on the mic because I felt it need one. I don't spend much money on audio equipment so I can't compare it to professional grade, but for just communication it works well. I'd step up to a standalone mic if I required better sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a gaming headset. He loved it and it looks very cool. He said the only reason he thinks it stopped working is because it fell but it looks like it would be able to survive a fall on carpet. Guess not. The headset sound is still working but the mic stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Stasiya

customer_reviews.title: Excellent build quality
customer_reviews.text: The sound is softer than the Razer 7.1 USB headset that it replaced. Everything else is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Pianistapr

customer_reviews.title: Works just as good as the $100 headphones for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Works just as good as the $100 headphones for gaming. My son uses them to talk as well, very comfortable even after an all day use
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: The headset feels really comfortable and sounds amazing
customer_reviews.text: The cord is long and thick enough to resist most abrasive wear. The headset feels really comfortable and sounds amazing. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a gaming headset.
customer_reviews.author: wraith

customer_reviews.title: 9/10 headset almost no problems with it whatsoever
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, great sound, I just plugged it in and it was good to go. Wires feel high quality, overall feels very sturdy only slightly uncomfortable but hardly enough to really be a problem
customer_reviews.author: Michael G

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage. After only a few hours the audio no ...
customer_reviews.text: Total garbage. After only a few hours the audio no longer works. I've checked with other headsets and there is no issue whatsoever, so I am certain the issue is with this headset.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great game headset. Nice quality. Like the design, which is cool. With comfortable ear cover and a professional microphone.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good pc headphones
customer_reviews.text: I play call of duty all the time. So I need good headphones with Mic . they sound good and my friends don't complain about Mic quality. I'm happy
customer_reviews.author: Tsyr Man

customer_reviews.title: Used this for two years and its still holding up
customer_reviews.text: Abused the crap out of this headset and its still here. Never had an complaints about the mic quality, the audio is great for its price, and the headset itself is quite comfy for my massive noggin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best headset ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this headset and i still can't believe how amazing it works. Sound is so good that when you have them on you can't hear outside noise. The mic is clear for others and the product is super durable as well!!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is very good. Plenty of bass changed my gaming experience immensely. Mic quality excellent. Only thing I would change is the cable. It's a buy stuff compared to my previous headset.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: These work great, and have lasted so far
customer_reviews.text: These work great, and have lasted so far. For a while, we thought they broke, but actually we had turned the volume down... oops. The sound quality is relatively good (I'm not an expert, but it's not noticeably fuzzy), and they are amazingly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ESW

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the money, would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Company has great customer service when their was an issue, would buy again. Comfortable and the mic quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great headset. Works well and it's not expensive at all.
customer_reviews.author: C. Money

customer_reviews.title: Sound great
customer_reviews.text: Sound great, nice to have usb connection. They also light up so you can find them in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: murphybrown

customer_reviews.title: Nice game headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, good sound and quiet. I don’t hear all the background noise when playing games with a group.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Jones

customer_reviews.title: Really not that bad
customer_reviews.text: For around 20 bucks you really can’t beat it. Mic works well, the headset is pretty comfortable and I have a very big head. The quality was pretty surprising for this cheap of a headset. The sound is no where close to terrible, but again you get what you pay for. If you are low on funds but need a headset. Get this for now and start saving.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Kazak

customer_reviews.title: a speaker blew within two weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: as the title suggests, one of the speakers blew soon after purchasing. it was only me using them so i can't blame the kids on this. logical conclusion, i either got a dud or these don't work too well
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Comfy even with glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfy to wear, even for long periods. The ear cups fit fully over the ear. The USB cable is about 6 feet long-perfect length. I do wish there was a way to turn off the red lights on the sides, but when they're on, you don't see them.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Started out great, now not so much.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great for about a month, then one day all of the sudden the speakers got really quiet and the mic would make a clicking sound. It's a bummer I really liked how they looked and worked for the first little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: REALLY comfortable. I like it. Just wish it had an inline mute button, but I'll take the trade-off.
customer_reviews.author: Greg F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves the clarity of voices. A little too big on ears
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my girlfriend, and she loves ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend, and she loves it. It does the job, has a mic and high quality sounds.It's a $20 dollar headset, and it definitely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Jiawei C.

customer_reviews.title: not very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: mine arrived and there was no sound. during setup i noticed the mic has delay. not very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Mahan

customer_reviews.title: I'm really happy with the results
customer_reviews.text: For 20 dollars what do you really expect out of a headset? Whatever it was I was expecting, I'm really happy with the results. Extremely durable cable with more or less comfortable headphones makes me a happy camper. The sound quality is probably worthy of some 40-60 dollars headsets out there, but nothing wildly special.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Rosenthal

product_meta.title: XIBERIA E1 USB Wired Gaming Headset, Over-Ear Stereo Gaming Headphones with Noise Canceling Microphone & Volume Control & LED for PC, PS4, Laptop, Mac
feature_bullets: Crystal Clear Audio: the highest cost performance headset in its price range provides distortion-free audio quality. Plus, deep bass gives you a really superior audio experience, just immerse yourself in the music or gaming world
Adjustable Microphone: the mic is flexible for exact positioning to clearly collects desired voice for prompt & clear teammate communication, meanwhile removing unwanted background noise

Comfortable Wearing: featuring lightweight body structure,soft ear cushions & breathable mesh earcup design, this USB headphone is actually intended for long-time wearing while effectively prevents you suffering too much sweat

Comfortable Wearing: featuring lightweight body structure,soft ear cushions & breathable mesh earcup design, this USB headphone is actually intended for long-time wearing while effectively prevents you suffering too much sweat

LED Lighting: with built-in red LED light, this surround sound headset not only serves as a perfect gift for gamers to look cool, but also sparks teammates' desire to keep going in the virtual gaming world
